thread.title: Royals' Jeremy Guthrie surprises student with ALDS tickets
thread.title_full: Royals' Jeremy Guthrie surprises student with ALDS tickets - KCTV5

author: Laura McCallister, Multimedia Producer
title: Royals' Jeremy Guthrie surprises student with ALDS tickets
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - It’s not every day a fan get a ticket personally delivered from one of the Kansas City Royals.
But that’s exactly what happened earlier this week when pitcher Jeremy Guthrie stopped by King Elementary in Kansas City. On Monday, Guthrie and the MLB gave first grader Marion Gragg and his foster family seats to Game 1 of the AL Division Series.
“Every day I work hard,” Marion said.
“It means a great deal to me. I don't think he understands yet, what he got into, but he said it was great,” said his foster mom, Erica Smith.
Marion has been in the care of Smith since April. The MLB worked with the Royals and the elementary school to pick out the child most deserving of the tickets. 
Click here to watch the final version of the Royals video.
